title: CDU Extension 2011 to 2012
abstractText: The extension of funding for the Census Dissemination Unit at Mimas will maintain the delivery of the CDU's services to ensure that the UK academic community continues to be provided with high quality dissemination of the aggregate outputs and related information from the UK 2001, 1991, 1981 and 1971 censuses. It will also continue the CDU and ESRC's engagement with the UK 2011 Census in order to influence its outputs to meet the requirements of the UK academic community, and will enable the CDU to prepare for timely dissemination of the 2011 Census Aggregate Outputs as they are released by the UK Census Agencies from mid-2012 onwards.
